divs: Sighting Detailsmy mom just came home from work she wanted me to go to the bank with her. as we were heading down 15th ave west in bradenton florida my mom spotted two jets flying ahead of us and said look at those planes i never seen them fly in that position before i agreed then when we passed some trees thats when i spotted a solid orb floating in midair safely follwoing the two planes then my mom spotted another jet behind the orb it was then that i realized they were flying in a reverse triangle pattern i mentioned my idea to my mom and she agreed that was "wierd espicially with that orb centered in the middle as we pullued up to a stop sign we watched the orb for minutes then it vanished and the planes went on like nothing happened my mother told me to tell my step father and he directed me to you to tell my sightings.
trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Bradenton
There were no other sightings in Bradenton on or around March 1st 2012
Summary: it aws a bright reddish orb floating between 3 planes heading west no clouds all of a sudden it vaneshes planes were in a triangular position with orb center my mother and i saw it clear as day
